title: How to Be a Maid on Animal Jam

steps.headline: Get diamonds.
steps.description: Diamonds are needed to buy the arctic wolf or the cheetah, which are some preferable animals if you're a maid.

steps.headline: Wear a maid's outfit.
steps.description: Put on a black tiara or a black head flower, a black princess necklace or a black necklace, a black tie-dye T-Shirt or a black phantom shirt or a black winter coat or a black arctic coat, and add some black accessories on your paws or tail.

steps.headline: Go to pillow room and say "Is a maid looking for a client!"
steps.description: If someone asks you to be their maid, add them as your buddy and go to their den.

steps.headline: Clean the house.
steps.description: Do things like getting rid of old furniture your client doesn't want anymore, dust with soft cloths, make the beds, vacuum, mop, clean the bathrooms, and help and do things for the children and parents when they need it.

steps.headline: Ask if you can get paid for your work.
steps.description: They might gift you items, as payment.

tyn: A cheetah/arctic wolf (optional) that looks like a maid.
text: Get diamonds. Diamonds are needed to buy the arctic wolf or the cheetah, which are some preferable animals if you're a maid. Wear a maid's outfit. Put on a black tiara or a black head flower, a black princess necklace or a black necklace, a black tie-dye T-Shirt or a black phantom shirt or a black winter coat or a black arctic coat, and add some black accessories on your paws or tail. Go to pillow room and say "Is a maid looking for a client!" If someone asks you to be their maid, add them as your buddy and go to their den. Clean the house. Do things like getting rid of old furniture your client doesn't want anymore, dust with soft cloths, make the beds, vacuum, mop, clean the bathrooms, and help and do things for the children and parents when they need it. Ask if you can get paid for your work. They might gift you items, as payment.
sentences: Diamonds are needed to buy the arctic wolf or the cheetah, which are some preferable animals if you're a maid.

Put on a black tiara or a black head flower, a black princess necklace or a black necklace, a black tie-dye T-Shirt or a black phantom shirt or a black winter coat or a black arctic coat, and add some black accessories on your paws or tail.
Go to pillow room and say "Is a maid looking for a client!"
If someone asks you to be their maid, add them as your buddy and go to their den.

Do things like getting rid of old furniture your client doesn't want anymore, dust with soft cloths, make the beds, vacuum, mop, clean the bathrooms, and help and do things for the children and parents when they need it.
Ask if you can get paid for your work.
They might gift you items, as payment.
